top_issues.suggested_action: Lower energy, enable limiter, or regenerate this segment.

top_issues.message: Segment audio likely overlaps the next segment.

Shorten translation, enable timing-fit/pacing, or regenerate this segment.
Enable pacing or regenerate with shorter text; if locked, unlock/regenerate then re-lock.
